archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.9c: c) conducting real-time monitoring of data feeds looking for alerts generated by the detection of conditions specified in use cases, indicating anomalous activity, behaviour or unexpected events
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
